items.title: KIPPO: Koopman-Inspired Proximal Policy Optimization
items.subtitle: A. Cozma, L. Harris, H. Qi
content: Applied Koopman theory to reinforcement learning for 6-60% performance gains over PPO with up to 91% variance reduction across continuous control benchmarks.

items.title: OmniFed: A Modular Framework for Scalable Federated Learning
items.subtitle: S. Tyagi, A. Cozma, O. Kotevska, F. Wang
content: Modular federated learning framework supporting centralized, decentralized, and hierarchical topologies with plug-and-play algorithm integration scaling from edge to HPC.

items.title: Learning Latent Linear Dynamics from Surgical Videos via Koopman-based Visual Representations
items.subtitle: L. Whatley, A. Cozma, J. Fan, H. Qi, F. Liu
content: Applied Koopman-inspired latent dynamics to surgical video, enabling multi-step prediction for robotic control and tool-tissue interaction analysis.

items.title: Cross-Scale MAE: A Tale of Multiscale Exploitation in Remote Sensing
items.subtitle: M. Tang, A. Cozma, K. Georgiou, H. Qi
content: Self-supervised framework with scale augmentation and cross-scale consistency constraints eliminating need for aligned multi-scale satellite imagery; achieved state-of-the-art performance across remote sensing benchmarks.
